title: Gangplank is 'Dead'

embed.description: Champion death is unprecedented in League of Legends, and we do not take it lightly. We encourage all Gangplank fans to remain calm for a few days until we can fully assess the situation. At this...

body: Can someone please elaborate on what it means by he's 'dead'? Is he just disabled because of a bug, or something? I don't know, I've never even heard of 'champion death' until now. Admins, Riot, anyone please clarify what is going on. What happened to Gangplank? {{champion:41}}

replies.body: Don't worry he will some eat some oranges and it will be k
But what if the oranges were not k
What if Gangplank was not kill
Oranges OP Needs a Nerf
They were Nerfed. That's why {{champion:41}}  is dead. It wasn't K. :'(
:=) i just bought a skin for him and this happened.. GREAT! just GREAT!
Ritogame is not nice :c{{champion:41}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:41}}
you my friend have won the league of legends forum
But Ghost Pirate Gangplank is still enabled right?

Heya
I think it could be apart of the event.

Regards Rkoturdo

After reading through Act 3 fully, I think that may be the case.

Plus, didn't you notice that MF is the Login Screen instead of GP...

Something's happened, but I feel like 'The Saltwater Scourge' will be back soon...hopefully sooner rather than later.
Yeah, wouldn't be the most ridiculous thing to spend all of that time revamping Gangplank just to kill him off permanently? Just don't see it.
I have a feeling a certain River King has a role to play in this. ;)

He died. Earlier in the week riots support board stated they will not be allowing refunds for him or skins at this point. As to whether he'll come back that remains unknown. By dead they mean Miss Fortune blew him up in order to avenge her parents, whom Gangplank killed years before. Rioters have already stated spooky ghost gangplank was just gangplank covered in paint, and no oranges can fix his death :(
GP "died", although anyone who has ever read a book knows the vilian never dies the first time, he will be back

> [{quoted}](name=LazerFruit,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=YG8xJdiZ,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-07-29T23:51:47.493+0000)
>
> GP "died", although anyone who has ever read a book knows the vilian never dies the first time, he will be back

Any examples? All I can think of is Sharptooth at the moment.

Oh man, Emperor Palpatine in the Star Wars Novels, That guy dies like 5 times before they finally finish him off. If I'm allowed to take this over  to Film, I'd point out that Captain Barbossa himself came back from assured death as well as Jack Sparrow who cheated death on several occasions. It's a sort of classic cliche for Pirates to come back from a watery grave.

Don't forget about comic books!  The whole "hes not dead until you see the body, and even then fire a second shot,..."
 he could be faking it!

Can't he just respawn? He does it all the time when I play him.

... ;_;

Champions don't respawn out of Summoners Rift. :/ 

S A D B O Y S
Well if he's re spawning or even dying in game then you don't know how to play GP.
That's the joke.
"Der Tod". please..
TIL LoL has a serious logic flaw.

Gangplank will be back. I really doubt Riot are stupid enough to kill off a champion that *has just been updated*. On top of throwing away all the work, they'd be stealing money from those who have bought stuff. It'd be utter anarchy with the uproar! What I'd love to see is Gangplank being teh first champion to get a second VU in such a short time. Making his original + skins a bit more battered or even Sion-like. Even better, just add a new skin; "Sea Cursed Gangplank" or something and make it a legendary! Would be cool if Riot had planned for this and was just waiting for some Player-pushed event to occur (more GP icons, more Graves than TF or something) and would have had 2 skins for GP in the barrel; one as him being "crowned" king of Bilgewater and the other as I-Am-Pirate-Sion!
Riot this is bullshit i picked the gangplank path and i cant play him NOW I WASTED MY ICON DANGIT ;(

I know you and everyone else who chose the GP path is upset, as am I, but let's not get angry over this. Gangplank will be back soon, i feel. He's not completely gone, he's just....not here at the moment. He'll be back, then you can eat all the oranges you want and be k.

INCOMING: Long Comment

Obviously riot is playing with us and are following their storyline for Bilgewater - Burning Tides, {{champion:41}} Gangplank is dead or as it says on his wiki page "Possibly deceased" something is still happening to him (or his body), these are my theories, Theory 1: During the explosion of his ship, he has fallen into the waters and sunk to the depths of the ocean, as {{champion:21}} Miss Fortune ordered, her crew search the waters and have no success in finding his corpse, its assumed that he is rotting away or has been devoured by the sea creatures below.... or unknowingly collected by {{champion:223}} Tahm Kench for his own "Aquired Taste". So there is a chance that GP is still alive and now under a debt thanks to the River King. Theory 2: The Summoners at the League of Legends have been informed that one of the Champions, {{champion:41}} Gangplank, is deceased, they then decide to disable him from all matches. Knowing the world of League and the fact that Riot cannot completely get rid of a champion (after all their hard work), the summoners will find a way to get him back in action, dead or alive, his body will probably be taken by the summoners to then later "Dissect" him, manage to extract his mind snatching it back from oblivion (like {{champion:268}} Azir) and resume is existence within the League, why do they need his mind? Cause thats how summoners summon and command their champions for battle (From what I remember from reading the lore). So expect him to be back, hopefully not as a ghost as a lot of people are saying, I cant imagine GP as a ghost for the rest of his League career. Plus previous champions have been in a life or death situation, like {{champion:15}} Sivir in Shurima: Rise of the Ascended and in the current story {{champion:104}} Graves and {{champion:4}} Twisted Fate. So remain calm, there will be a saviour in this story too. {{champion:17}}
I literally bought him played him once then he died...aw crap this sucks

(I only skimmed through Act 3 so this may be slightly inaccurate)

Miss Fortune destroyed GP's ship, but I'm pretty sure a master pirate like GP could have survived that. He may be thought dead for the remainder of the Bilgewater event, but how could Riot get rid of a champ they just reworked?

I honestly hope they enlighten us on this soon, I too and baffled by this and I would like for them to calm me down because up till now, GP is the only rework I'm purely happy with.... cos god knows Miss Fortune looks like my ginger ex girlfriend with a branch up her ass.....
Gangplank went turbo I think

Much Rekt ralph many wow. 

He went to Dota
He is just in the hospital with scurvy.  I knew they should have given him limes instead of those oranges!
Gangplank's Special Force skin is going on sale in August so he might be back after this event {{champion:41}}
Well, there was a bug where his ult had no cooldown.
They better bring him back. I just spent X number to get him after the rework. I will not be pleased if they make him dead and then pull some bs

I believe it is in the lore that he is currently dead, as Miss Fortune killed him. However, I feel like Riot's gonna pull something in the Lore, and our favorite pirate will be back before we know it. Until then, we'll just have to wait and see, and not play GP for a while.
just when i started enjoying my oranges while  setting barrels on fire they decided to disable him fuck you riot
I blame {{champion:21}}
I blame {{champion:41}} he wasnt k

Show me a body to bury or it didn't happen. {{champion:83}} 
Riot wants us to think GP is dead but he probably escaped the fiery wreckage!! All that drama. {{item:3026}}
Classic comic book villain, "muhahaha, i just wait here till they think i'm dead, then ill pop up kill my "killer" and reclaim my throne.

Well, technically, in the Bilgewater lore story that is about the rivalry between Graves and Twisted Fate (spoiler alert), Gangplank is assasinated by Miss Fortune. I think Riot is trying to make the lore seem real. I think it will lead into a bigger plot however and Gangplank will return. I think he is the man who gets his arm cut off at the end of the story.
Well, I think that GP isn't dead.. As you can read in the story MF says "everyone loyal to him [...] and I want his _**corpse**_"...

lol gp gets actually 2nd model update see yourself here 
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/champion-update/gangplank-sails-pbe
You know what else is happening in the new few days right? LCS Playoffs. New Champion hype? New champ from Bilgewater? {{champion:41}} {{summoner:2}}
